Real Name: Daniel Berkhart
Special Powers
SECRET IDENTITY: JACK O'LANTERN, MYSTERIO: When Daniel Berkhart would be KO'd, you may instead replace him with a Secret Identity character with a listed name on click #9. This game, when that replacement is KO'd, it scores this character's points and an additional 25 points.
CUT THROUGH THE ILLUSIONS: Opposing characters within 4 squares can't use Stealth.
